docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 12 -- The war in the Chaco jungle that has cost Bolivia and Paraguay 100,000 dead and wounded in the last year and a half, appeared tonight to be near its end.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 12 -- The war in the Chaco jungle that has cost Bolivia and Paraguay 100,000 dead and wounded in the last year and a half, appeared tonight to be near its end.
docs.abstract: Paraguay sees end of war; 19 nations at Pan Amer Conf plan pressure to end war

headline.main: PARAGUAY SEES END OF THE CHACO WAR; Foreign Affairs and Defense Ministers Feel That Bolivia's Armies Have Collapsed.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 13. -- Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt, Mrs. Woodrow Wilson and Mrs. William Howard Taft attended today the first of the season's musicales given by Mrs. Lawrence Townsend at the Mayflower Hotel.

docs.snippet: A vigorous rally in United States Government bonds featured yesterday an otherwise irregularly lower bond market on the Stock Exchange. In the domestic corporation list, utility issues showed better strength than did railroad and industrial...
docs.lead_paragraph: A vigorous rally in United States Government bonds featured yesterday an otherwise irregularly lower bond market on the Stock Exchange. In the domestic corporation list, utility issues showed better strength than did railroad and industrial obligations, while in the foreign loans German issues were especially weak.
docs.abstract: Independent protective com formed for holders of first mortgage sinking fund bonds

headline.main: FEDERAL BONDS UP AS OTHERS DECLINE; Utilities Stronger Than Rails and Industrials in Active Trading on Stock Exchange. WEAKNESS IN FOREIGN LIST German Issues Off From Fractions to More Than 5 Points -- Prices Go Lower on the Curb.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 13. -- The Paraguayan delegation to the Pan-American Conference here announced today the capture of Fort Samaklay (also called Agua Rica), between Nanawa (Ayala) and Saavedra, indicating a Paraguayan drive on Fort Saavedra...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 13. -- The Paraguayan delegation to the Pan-American Conference here announced today the capture of Fort Samaklay (also called Agua Rica), between Nanawa (Ayala) and Saavedra, indicating a Paraguayan drive on Fort Saavedra before the Bolivians tiave time to reorganize their defeated armies.
docs.abstract: Paraguayans take Ft Samaklay and 600 prisoners; new drive impends; Roosevelt said to have sent 2 cables on U S stand to Pan Amer Conf

headline.main: PARAGUAYANS TAKE NEW FORT IN CHACO; Bolivians Lose Samaklay and 600 Prisoners, Says Foe -- New Drive Impends. ROOSEVELT IN PEACE MOVE He Is Said to Have Sent Two Cables on Our Stand to the Conference in Uruguay.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 14. -- From the avalanche of proposals poured into the seventh Pan-American Conference by its ninety-four delegates from twenty countries, several projects are gradually assuming concrete form in subcommittees, and some of them may...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Dec. 14. -- From the avalanche of proposals poured into the seventh Pan-American Conference by its ninety-four delegates from twenty countries, several projects are gradually assuming concrete form in subcommittees, and some of them may emerge as definite accomplishments at this conference.
